name: Find the Charger
description:
Sarah's phone just rang, but she realizes that it will be soon out of battery ! She has 20s to find the two pieces of charger hidden in her room and don't miss THE call of her life !

This game is currently under development for the 20sGameJam.

To move Sarah the Fox, use the arrow keys on the your keyboard and hit space to look for the charger parts into the furniture inside the room.
